parameters.name: Br
parameters.description: Radial (Saturn to spacecraft) component of the magnetic field, positive away from Saturn.

parameters.name: Btheta
parameters.description: North/South component of the magnetic field, positive southward.

parameters.name: Bphi
parameters.description: Azimuthal component of the magnetic field, positive eastward.

parameters.name: Bmag
parameters.description: Magnitude (sqrt of sum of squares) of the field component averages.

parameters.name: Average Bmag
parameters.description: Average of the field magnitude over the averaging interval (nT).

parameters.name: Delta
parameters.description: Spacecraft centered heliographic magnetic field latitude: Delta = asin(Bz/Bmag). Delta is derived from Cartesian coordinates.

parameters.name: Lambda
parameters.description: Spacecraft centered heliographic magnetic field longitude: Lambda = atan(By/Bx). Lambda is derived from Cartesian coordinates.

parameters.name: RMS Br
parameters.description: Root-mean-square deviation of Br over the averaging interval.

parameters.name: RMS Bt
parameters.description: Root-mean-square deviation of Btheta over the averaging interval.

parameters.name: RMS Bp
parameters.description: Root-mean-square deviation of Bphi over the averaging interval.

parameters.name: NPTS
parameters.description: Number of points in the average.
